Key Match Events: Lisandro Martínez made two saves for Argentina in the penalty shootout, helping the team advance to the semifinals of the Copa América.
Kevin Rodríguez scored for Ecuador in the 90'+1' to tie the match 1-1 in regulation time.
Lionel Messi scored for Argentina in the 35' to give the team the lead in regulation time.
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina advance to the semifinals of the Copa América after beating Ecuador 4-2 on penalties.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended 1-1 in regulation time.
Others: The match was played at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas, USA, with an attendance of 69,456.
The referee for the match was Andrés Matonte.
